verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> unto Moses לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Depart עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> [and] go up מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> here אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you וְהָעָ֔ם <WH5971> hence thou and the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הֶֽעֱלִ֖יתָ <WH5927> which thou hast brought up מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of which נִ֠שְׁבַּעְתִּי <WH7650> which I sware לְאַבְרָהָ֨ם <WH85> unto Abraham לְיִצְחָ֤ק <WH3327> to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> and to Jacob לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לְזַרְעֲךָ֖ <WH2233> Unto thy seed אֶתְּנֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5414> will I give

וְשָׁלַחְתִּ֥י <WH7971> And I will send לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> before מַלְאָ֑ךְ <WH4397> an angel וְגֵֽרַשְׁתִּ֗י <WH1644> thee and I will drive out אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> the Canaanite הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> the Amorite וְהַֽחִתִּי֙ <WH2850> and the Hittite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> and the Perizzite הַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> the Hivite וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> and the Jebusite

אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> Unto a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> flowing חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <WH1706> and honey כִּי֩ <WH3588> because לֹ֨א <WH3808> I will not אֶֽעֱלֶ֜ה <WH5927> for I will not go up בְּקִרְבְּךָ֗ <WH7130> in the midst כִּ֤י <WH3588> because עַם־ <WH5971> people קְשֵׁה־ <WH7186> churlish עֹ֙רֶף֙ <WH6203> stiff-necked אַ֔תָּה <WH859> and I פֶּן־ <WH6435> might אֲכֶלְךָ֖ <WH3615> lest I consume בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> thee in the way

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> And when the people אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> tidings הָרָ֛ע <WH7451> these evil הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this וַיִּתְאַבָּ֑לוּ <WH56> they mourned וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not שָׁ֛תוּ <WH7896> did put אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and no man עֶדְי֖וֹ <WH5716> on him his ornaments עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> had said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses אֱמֹ֤ר <WH559> Say אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you עַם־ <WH5971> people קְשֵׁה־ <WH7186> churlish עֹ֔רֶף <WH6203> stiff-necked רֶ֧גַע <WH7281> moment אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> of thee in a אֶֽעֱלֶ֥ה <WH5927> I will come up בְקִרְבְּךָ֖ <WH7130> into the midst וְכִלִּיתִ֑יךָ <WH3615> and consume וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now הוֹרֵ֤ד <WH3381> thee therefore now put off עֶדְיְךָ֙ <WH5716> thy ornaments מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> and וְאֵדְעָ֖ה <WH3045> from thee that I may know מָ֥ה <WH4100> what אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> what to do לָּֽךְ׃

וַיִּֽתְנַצְּל֧וּ <WH5337> stripped בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> עֶדְיָ֖ם <WH5716> themselves of their ornaments מֵהַ֥ר <WH2022> by the mount חוֹרֵֽב׃ <WH2722> Horeb

וּמֹשֶׁה֩ <WH4872> And Moses יִקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֹ֜הֶל <WH168> the tabernacle וְנָֽטָה־ <WH5186> and pitched ל֣וֹ ׀ מִח֣וּץ <WH2351> it without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <WH4264> the camp הַרְחֵק֙ <WH7368> afar off מִן־ <WH4480> from הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> from the camp וְקָ֥רָא <WH7121> and called ל֖וֹ אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> it the Tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> and everyone מְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> And it came to pass [that] every one which sought יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD יֵצֵא֙ <WH3318> went out אֶל־ <WH413> to אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> unto the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which מִח֥וּץ <WH2351> which [was] without לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> the camp

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> came כְּצֵ֤את <WH3318> went out מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And it came to pass when Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> unto the tabernacle יָק֙וּמוּ֙ <WH6965> rose up כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> [that] all the people וְנִ֨צְּב֔וּ <WH5324> and stood אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> door אָהֳל֑וֹ <WH168> [at] his tent וְהִבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <WH5027> and looked אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּא֖וֹ <WH935> until he was gone הָאֹֽהֱלָה׃ <WH168> into the tabernacle

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become כְּבֹ֤א <WH935> entered מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And it came to pass as Moses הָאֹ֔הֱלָה <WH168> into the tabernacle יֵרֵד֙ <WH3381> descended עַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> pillar הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <WH6051> the cloudy וְעָמַ֖ד <WH5975> and stood פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> [at] the door הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle וְדִבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> and [the LORD] talked עִם־ <WH5973> with מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> with Moses

וְרָאָ֤ה <WH7200> saw כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And all the people אֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> pillar הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <WH6051> the cloudy עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> stand פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> door הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> [at] the tabernacle וְקָ֤ם <WH6965> rose up כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and all the people וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֔וּ <WH7812> and worshipped אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> door אָהֳלֽוֹ׃ <WH168> [in] his tent

וְדִבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> unto Moses פָּנִ֣ים <WH6440> face אֶל־ <WH413> to פָּנִ֔ים <WH6440> to face כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after יְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> speaketh אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> as a man אֶל־ <WH413> to his רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> unto his friend וְשָׁב֙ <WH7725> And he turned again אֶל־ <WH413> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> into the camp וּמְשָׁ֨רְת֜וֹ <WH8334> but his servant יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נוּן֙ <WH5126> of Nun נַ֔עַר <WH5288> a young man לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָמִ֖ישׁ <WH4185> departed מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> not out הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> of the tabernacle ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD רְ֠אֵה <WH7200> See אַתָּ֞ה <WH859> You אֹמֵ֤ר <WH559> thou sayest אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me הַ֚עַל <WH5927> unto me Bring up אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you לֹ֣א <WH3808> not הֽוֹדַעְתַּ֔נִי <WH3045> and thou hast not let me know אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom תִּשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> whom thou wilt send עִמִּ֑י <WH5973> with וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> You אָמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <WH559> with me Yet thou hast said יְדַעְתִּ֣יךָֽ <WH3045> I know בְשֵׁ֔ם <WH8034> thee by name וְגַם־ <WH1571> have also מָצָ֥אתָ <WH4672> and thou hast also found חֵ֖ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> in my sight

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> Now אִם־ <WH518> if נָא֩ <WH4994> pray מָצָ֨אתִי <WH4672> Now therefore I pray thee if I have found חֵ֜ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight הוֹדִעֵ֤נִי <WH3045> shew נָא֙ <WH4994> pray אֶת־ <WH853> דְּרָכֶ֔ךָ <WH1870> me now thy way וְאֵדָ֣עֲךָ֔ <WH3045> that I may know לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> so אֶמְצָא־ <WH4672> thee that I may find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight וּרְאֵ֕ה <WH7200> and consider כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> [is] thy people הַגּ֥וֹי <WH1471> that this nation הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> And he said פָּנַ֥י <WH6440> My presence יֵלֵ֖כוּ <WH1980> shall go וַהֲנִחֹ֥תִי <WH5117> [with thee] and I will give thee rest לָֽךְ׃

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to him אִם־ <WH518> If אֵ֤ין <WH369> else פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> unto him If thy presence הֹלְכִ֔ים <WH1980> go אַֽל־ <WH408> nay תַּעֲלֵ֖נוּ <WH5927> not [with me] carry us not up מִזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> here

וּבַמֶּ֣ה ׀ <WH4100> how יִוָּדַ֣ע <WH3045> For wherein shall it be known אֵפ֗וֹא <WH645> here כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָצָ֨אתִי <WH4672> have found חֵ֤ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> your sight אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I וְעַמֶּ֔ךָ <WH5971> that I and thy people הֲל֖וֹא <WH3808> not בְּלֶכְתְּךָ֣ <WH1980> along עִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> with וְנִפְלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH6395> with us? so shall we be separated אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I וְעַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> I and thy people מִכָּ֨ל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> from all the people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> are upon פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [are] upon the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the earth פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses גַּ֣ם <WH1571> will also אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> of which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> also that thou hast spoken אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> I will do כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָצָ֤אתָ <WH4672> for thou hast found חֵן֙ <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינַ֔י <WH5869> in my sight וָאֵדָעֲךָ֖ <WH3045> and I know בְּשֵֽׁם׃ <WH8034> thee by name
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> And he said הַרְאֵ֥נִי <WH7200> shew נָ֖א <WH4994> I beseech thee אֶת־ <WH853> כְּבֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> me thy glory

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲנִ֨י <WH589> Myself אַעֲבִ֤יר <WH5674> pass כָּל־ <WH3605> all טוּבִי֙ <WH2898> I will make all my goodness עַל־ <WH5921> and פָּנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before וְקָרָ֧אתִֽי <WH7121> before thee and I will proclaim בְשֵׁ֛ם <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> before וְחַנֹּתִי֙ <WH2603> thee and will be gracious אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to whom אָחֹ֔ן <WH2603> to whom I will be gracious וְרִחַמְתִּ֖י <WH7355> and will shew mercy אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אֲרַחֵֽם׃ <WH7355> on whom I will shew mercy

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said לֹ֥א <WH3808> no תוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> Thou canst לִרְאֹ֣ת <WH7200> not see אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֑י <WH6440> my face כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִרְאַ֥נִי <WH7200> see הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> for there shall no man וָחָֽי׃ <WH2425> me and live

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> Behold [there is] a place אִתִּ֑י <WH853> וְנִצַּבְתָּ֖ <WH5324> by me and thou shalt stand עַל־ <WH5921> on הַצּֽוּר׃ <WH6697> upon a rock

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> will come בַּעֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> passeth by כְּבֹדִ֔י <WH3519> And it shall come to pass while my glory וְשַׂמְתִּ֖יךָ <WH7760> that I will put בְּנִקְרַ֣ת <WH5366> thee in a clift הַצּ֑וּר <WH6697> of the rock וְשַׂכֹּתִ֥י <WH5526> and will cover כַפִּ֛י <WH3709> thee with my hand עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> and עַד־ <WH5704> while עָבְרִֽי׃ <WH5674> I pass by

וַהֲסִרֹתִי֙ <WH5493> And I will take אֶת־ <WH853> כַּפִּ֔י <WH3709> away mine hand וְרָאִ֖יתָ <WH7200> and thou shalt see אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֹרָ֑י <WH268> my back parts וּפָנַ֖י <WH6440> but my face לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יֵרָאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> shall not be seen ס
